content.question: How is Dr. Hart operationally defining sleep deprivation?

choices.label: Monitoring participants each time their EEG indicates they are in NREM sleep
Awakening participants each time their EEG indicates REM sleep
The number of unrelated words remembered after the observed night of sleep

content.answer: Awakening participants each time their EEG indicates REM sleep
